name: Olympic Tetul Sweet & Sour Lozenge (Candy)
description:
The Olympic Tetul Sweet & Sour Lozenge (Candy) is a tangy and flavorful treat, combining the sweet and sour taste of tamarind in a convenient candy form. Each pack contains 50 individually wrapped lozenges, making it perfect for sharing or enjoying on the go. Known for its bold and refreshing flavor, this candy is a favorite for those who love a balance of sweet and tangy tastes​.

name: Olympic Juicy Litchi Lozenge (Candy)
description:
The Olympic Juicy Litchi Lozenge (Candy) is a sweet treat packed with the exotic flavor of litchi, offering a fruity and refreshing experience. Each pouch contains 50 individually wrapped candies, making it convenient for sharing or enjoying on the go. This candy is a delightful snack for all ages, crafted to uplift your mood with its juicy and vibrant taste. Perfect for a quick sweet indulgence or as a gift for candy lovers.

name: Olympic Green Mango Lozenge (Candy)
description:
The Olympic Green Mango Lozenge (Candy), available in packs of 50 pieces, is a tangy and sweet treat, offering a delightful green mango flavor that many enjoy as a refreshing snack. This candy combines the sweet and sour essence of green mango with a chewy texture, making it a popular choice among all age groups. Ingredients: Includes sugar, glucose syrup, citric acid, artificial mango flavor, and coloring agents​. Use: Ideal as a quick snack or treat throughout the day. It is perfect for those looking for a fruity and tangy flavor boost. The lozenge is also commonly shared in gatherings or used as a gift​.

name: Cavendish & Harvey Candy Wild Berry Drops
description:
Embark on a journey into the wild with Cavendish & Harvey Candy Wild Berry Drops, a 175-gram tin of exquisite hard candies that capture the essence of a vibrant berry medley. These premium candies are a testament to the art of confectionery, offering a burst of fruity delight in each delightful piece. Elevate your candy experience with Cavendish & Harvey Candy Wild Berry Drops and enjoy the vibrant fusion of wild berries and sweet indulgence in every piece.

name: Haribo Chamallows Party Candy
description:
Soft and Fluffy, HARIBO Chamallows Party candy has a unique texture that melts in the mouth for an indulgent treat. Perfect for barbecue toasting, chocolate fondue, and Chamallow lollipop creations.

description:

name: Haribo Chamallows Pink & White Candy
description:
Utterly scrumptious and delightfully yummy. These fun Pink and White Marshmallows are guaranteed to bring a big, sweet smile to anyone's face. Soft and yummy Chamallows are loved by all ages and especially by children.

name: Haribo GoldBears Candy
description:
HARIBO Goldbears have been the gummi candy gold standard worldwide for over 90 years. Each bag contains five fruity flavors- Lemon, Orange, Pineapple, Raspberry, and Strawberry. HARIBO Sour Goldbears feature our original gummi bear flavors with a mildly sour, tangy coating. Our gummi bears are perfect for snacking and sharing. HARIBO Goldbears represent childlike happiness, no matter your age, and no matter the occasion. Eat them, play with them, and make them dance- our soft, chewy, fruit-flavored gummies are the perfect treat to share with friends, family, or co-workers.  Try a bag of these delicious gummies today, and let us know which flavor is “better!

name: Fox's Crystal Clear Berries Candy
description:
Fox's Crystal Clear Berries Candy is a refreshing and flavorful treat, offering a delicious mix of berry flavors in every crystal-clear candy. Made with high-quality ingredients, these candies are perfect for anyone craving a sweet, fruity snack. The smooth, clear texture and tangy berry taste make them a delightful choice for a quick sugar fix. Ideal for sharing, gifting, or enjoying on your own, these candies offer a satisfying and refreshing experience with each piece. Ingredients: Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Citric Acid, Berry Flavors (such as strawberry, raspberry, blueberry, etc.), Artificial Colorings, Flavor Enhancers, and Preservatives (if applicable). Uses:Sweet Snack: Perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings anytime.Tea or Coffee Companion: Pairs well with your favorite hot beverage.Gift Idea: Attractive packaging makes it a great gift for friends and family.Party Favor: Ideal for sharing at parties or gatherings.Travel Snack: Easy to carry and consume while on the go. Benefits:Berry Flavor: Enjoy the refreshing and tangy taste of mixed berry flavors with every candy.Satisfies Sweet Cravings: A perfect candy option for those who want a quick and satisfying treat.Portable: Easy to carry around, making it a great option for snacking on the go.Resealable Packaging: Keeps candies fresh and prevents them from spilling.

name: Fox's Crystal Clear Fruits Candy
description:
Fox's Crystal Clear Chocolate, packaged in a 180-gram format, is known for its smooth and creamy chocolate experience. Here are some details about this product: Ingredients: Generally includes sugar, cocoa butter, milk solids, cocoa mass, and emulsifiers. Always check the packaging for specifics. Flavor: Known for its rich chocolate taste, often with a sweet and creamy profile. Texture: Smooth and melting, ideal for snacking. Nutritional Information (per 100g, approximate):Calories: Around 500-550 kcalFat: 30-35gSaturated Fat: 15-20gCarbohydrates: 50-55gSugars: 40-45gProtein: 5-7g Fox's chocolates are popular for their quality and flavor, making them a delightful treat. name: Haribo Happy Grapes Candy
description:
HARIBO Happy Grapes with three different grape flavors, inspired by original grapes and formulated with no artificial coloring : sweet and fruity Concord, sweet and sour Kyoho and fragrant Muscat.
